274237.「私は 列車が 大好きでねぇ。\n 人類の発明品の中で こいつが ピカイチさ。:
I just love trains. Out of all the inventions
of mankind, this one is easily the best.

274238.「これはね ４００年前……大陸間鉄道の\n 開通式に出席したとき くばられた\n:
I got this as a souvenir when I attended the
grand opening of the Intercontinental
Railroad 400 years ago...isn't it great?

274239.「まあ 出席したといっても\n 翼を隠し お忍びでなんだがね。:
Well, if you call attending blending in with
the crowd with your wings hidden.

274240.「天使や フォーリオンの存在は\n アストルティアの民に 秘匿されている。:
The existence of us angels and Fourion is a
kept secret from the people of Astoltia.

274241.「陰ながら 世界を見守るのが\n 祖先が ルティアナ様と交わした 約束なんだ。:
It was a promise that our ancestors made to
Lutiana that we would watch over the world
in secrecy.

274242.「英雄たちに 試練を課すのも 我らの使命……\n 世界の守護を まっとうするため:
Our mission is to put those who have shown
themselves as champions through many trials,
thus doing our part to protect the world.

274243.「ほぅ……やはり 美しいな。四天の星巡りを\n 乗り越えた 英雄の魂というものは:
Ah...it's truly a beautiful sight, isn't it?
The soul of a champion who has overcome the
Four Heavenly Trials.

274244.「まばゆい光に 満ちている。\n よくぞ 四天の星巡りを 突破してくれた。\n:
It dazzles with a brilliant light... Well done
on making it all the way through. Yuliza was
right about you.

274245.「前置きが 長くなったね……。\n 私は 聖天舎を預かる天使長 ミトラー。:
Sorry about that, I got a little carried
away... I am Mitra, Archangel and chief of
the Monastery.

274246.「まあ カンタンに言えば 四天の星巡りを\n つかさどる者たちの 長だ。:
To put it simply...I am the one who oversees
the Four Heavenly Trials.

274247.「お前の 突破してきた 四天の星巡りは\n 英雄の魂を きたえるためのもの\n:
The Four Heavenly Trials are meant to steel
the souls of champions...I wonder if you've
already realized that.

274248.「きたえぬかれた 魂のみが\n 我らの望む 高みへと 到達しうる。\n だから:
Only well-trained souls can reach the heights
that we desire. That is why we have high
expectations of you.

274249.「フォーリオンには お前に 反感を抱く者も\n 少なくないが……実力を 認めてい:
There are many in Fourion who aren't very fond
of you...but there are also many who recognize
your abilities. Be sure not to forget that.

274250.「さて……四天の星巡りを 乗り越えた者には\n 最後の仕上げとして みそぎを\n:
Now then...those who have passed the Four
Heavenly Trials will be asked to undergo a
purification ritual as the final step.

274251.「みそぎとは 偉大なるチカラを得る前に\n これまでの罪や ケガレを払う 儀式だ:
This purification is a way to purge your past
sins and wounds, and must be done so before
attaining the great power.

274252.「偉大なるチカラが いかなるものかは……\n みそぎを終えたあとに 明かすとしよ:
As for what that great power is... I will tell
you once the purification is finished.
Please wait here for just a moment.

274253.「みそぎは 浄罪の泉にて おこなえる。\n 聖天区画の 東にある建物を 目指すと:
The purification can be performed at the
Spring of Purity. You can find it in the
building east of the Holy Grounds.

274254.「ふーん。水がめから 流れる水を\n 浴びるだけで いいのかぁ……。:
Hmmm... So all I have to do is bathe in the
water that flows from the water jug...

274258.「あ～。お前は そこで見ていなさい。\n アシュレイ殿の あとだ。あと。:
Ah~. You stay right there and watch. After
Ashley. After.

274259.「悪いな。すぐ すませるから！: Sorry about that. I'll be quick!

274260.「くっ くっせえ！ どうなってんだ？\n 汚れた水で みそぎを やれってのか！:
Damn! What's going on? You want me to do
purification with dirty water!

274261.「まさか これも試練だって\n 言うんじゃ ないだろうな？\n 天使ってヤツぁ:
Don't tell me you're calling this a trial,
too? That heavenly creature is so mean.

274262.「ち ちがいますよ。試練じゃありません。\n こんなの 想定外のトラブルです！:
No, it's not. This is not a trial. This is an
unexpected trouble!

274263.「急ぎ 天使長に ご報告せねば！: I must report to the Archangel immediately!

274264.「いやいや あんたが 持ち場を離れちゃ\n ダメでしょ。代わりに 俺らが行ってや:
No, no, you can't leave your post. We'll go
instead.

274265.「おお！ それなら ぜひ！: Oh! Well, then, by all means!

274266.「というわけだ。俺は アシュレイ。\n 生前は 勇者をやっていた。:
So. My name is Ashley. I was a Hero before
I died.

274267.「しかも 初代なんだぜ 初代！ \n 始まりの大魔王 ゴダを倒したのは\n 何を:
And it's the first generation. The first
generation! I'm the one who defeated Goda, the
Great Demon King of the Beginning! Yeah!

274268.<pc>は アシュレイに\n勇者の盟友であると 自己紹介した。:
<pc> introduced himself to Ashley as
a Hero ally.

274270.「いいじゃないか。\n 勇者と盟友で 仲良くやろうぜ！: That's good. Hero and ally, let's get along!

274271.「ぐおっ……臭いが キツくなってきたな。\n 鼻が 曲がらないうちに\n 聖天舎:
The smell is getting stronger. Let's go report
this to the Archangel of the monastery before
our noses get bent.

274272.「……初代勇者と当代の盟友が そろって\n どういう了見だ？\n 私は みそぎを:
The first Hero and the ally of today...
What are you doing? I told
you to do the purification ritual.

274273.「よもや 水浴びは冷たいから\n 気が進まんなどと ぬかすのでは あるまいな？:
You are not saying that you don't like to
bathe in the water because it is cold, are
you?

274274.「冷たいだけなら よかったんだけどさ。\n ……なあ？:
It would have been fine if it was just cold.
But... hey, you know what?

274275.<pc>は 浄罪の泉が 汚水まみれになり\nみそぎが できなくなったと 天使長に:
<pc> informed the Archangel that the
Spring of Purity had become so filthy that the
purification ceremony wasn't possible.

274277.「す すまない。天星郷 始まって以来の事故だ。\n 言葉を 失ってしまったよ……:
I'm sorry. This is the first accident in
Heaven. I'm speechless...

274278.「いにしえの 大崩壊の日でさえ……\n 奴らに フォーリオンが 蹂躙されても\n:
Even on the day of the Great Fall of the
Ancient One, when Fourion was overrun, that
water source remained unharmed.

274279.「それはひとえに 女神の加護が あったゆえ。\n もはや 加護は失われてしまった:
It was because of the blessings of the
Goddess. But now that blessing is gone...

274280.「そんな 深刻にならんでも……。 \n 汚れたんなら キレイに掃除すれば\n い:
Don't be so serious... if it's dirty, why
don't you just clean it up? I don't know.

274281.「切り替えが早いな。さすがは 初代勇者。\n ならば お前たちに 泉の浄化を頼む:
You're quick to switch. You are indeed the first Hero. In that case, I shall ask you to purify the Fountain. What do you think? Will
you accept?

274282.「おいおい 冗談だろ。\n 俺らに ドブさらいをやれっての？:
Oh, come on, you've got to be kidding. You
want us to go out there and clean?

274283.「人助けこそ お前の本分であろう？\n なぜなら 勇者なのだから……ってね。:
Helping people is what you're supposed to do,
right? Because you are a Hero...

274284.「困ってる私に 手を貸しておくれよ。: I'm in trouble, and I could use a hand.

274285.「それとも 我々が 泉を浄化するまで\n 神都の回生堂で 無為に時を過ごすかね？:
Or will you pass your time idly in the rest
spot of the sacred city until we purify the
Fountain?

274286.「それは……ごめんだな。\n 退屈すぎて 二度目の死を 迎えそうだ。:
I'm... sorry about that. I'm so bored I'm
about to die a second time.

274287.「俺は 引き受けようと思う。\n お前も 手伝ってくれるよな？<yesno><c:
I'll take care of it. You'll help me, won't
you?<yesno><close>

274288.「え？ 今 なんて言った？\n よく 聞こえなかったんだけど。:
What? What did you say? I couldn't hear you
very well.

274289.「いいか？ もっかい 聞くぞ。\n お前も 手伝ってくれるよな？<yesno><:
Okay? I'm gonna ask you one more time. You're
gonna help me, right?<yesno><close>

274290.「よし きた！\n それでこそ 勇者の盟友だ。:
I've got it! So there you have it, Hero's
ally.

274291.「では 浄化のほう よろしく頼むぞ。:
Then, please take care of the purification
process.

274292.「どうやって 浄化するかは……そうだな。\n 前代未聞のことでもあるし\n 聖天:
As for how to purify it... well, let's see.
It's something unprecedented, and you can look
it up in the monastery's archives.

274293.「えっ 丸投げなの！？: What, you're throwing it all in!?

274294.「その通りだ。四天の星巡りの 延長戦とでも\n 思ってくれ。書庫は この聖天舎の:
That's right. Think of it as an extension of the Four Heavenly Trials. The study is on the west side of the 2ndF of this monastery. Come
on, go, go.

274295.「ん……なんか みつけたのか？\n もしかして 浄化の方法が書いてある本か！:
Did you find something? Maybe it's a book on
how to purify!

274297.「えーと なになに……清めの大玉？\n こいつがあれば 汚れちまった泉を\n キ:
Well, what is it... Purifying Orb? With this,
I can clean up the fountain that's been
polluted.

274298.「で どこにあるんだ？ 清めの大玉とやらは。\n あんた 知ってるかい？: So where is it? Purifying Orb? Do you know?

274299.「いいえ わたくしも くわしくは……。 \n 知っているのは あらゆる汚れを 浄:
Please tell me more... I only know that it is
an amazing chemical that purifies all kinds of
dirt.

274300.「使われた 記録がないので その薬品は\n 聖天舎にも ないかもしれません。:
There is no record of its use, so the orb may
not even be in the Monastery.

274301.「でも ほら……作れるって 書いてあるぞ。\n 破邪の黒曜石ってのがあれば いい:
But, you know... it says you can make it. All
you need is Crushing Obsidian.

274302.「破邪の黒曜石ですか……あいにく\n フォーリオンじゃ 採れないんですよね。\n:
Crushing Obsidian...unfortunately you can't
get it in Fourion. I guess you can get it in
Astoltia.

274303.「いいねぇ。観光がてら 行ってくるよ。\n 俺が生きていた時代と どれくらい\n:
That's nice. I'm going there for sightseeing.
I want to see how much things have changed
since I was alive.

274304.「えっ 知らないんですか？\n 英雄は 天星郷から 出られないんですよ。\n 魂:
What? You don't know? Heroes can't leave
Heaven. It's a false life restored from the
soul.

274305.「でも あなたの となりにいる人なら\n アストルティアにも 行けるでしょうね。:
But the person next to you could probably make
it to Astoltia. After all, he's alive.

274306.「お お前……そうか！\n 当代の盟友って 言ってたもんな。:
Oh, you... oh, yeah! You said you were the
ally of today.

274307.「生きながらにして 英雄って……。\n お前 なにげに すごい奴だったんだな。:
A living hero... You must have been an amazing
guy.

274308.「俺には 行けないんじゃ しかたがない。\n 破邪の黒曜石の調達は お前にまかせ:
If I can't go, what can I do? I'll leave it to
you to procure the Crushing Obsidian.

274309.「んー？ 首尾よく 材料が手に入っても\n 調合できる奴がいなきゃ 話にならんか:
Hmm? Even if you get the ingredients
successfully, it's no good if you don't have
someone who can mix it...

274310.「ウデのたつ薬師を 見つける必要があるなぁ。\n よし！ そっちは 俺が探しとく:
We need to find a medicine man who knows what
he's doing. All right! I'll find that one.

274311.「にしても 破邪の黒曜石が\n アストルティアの どこにあるかが\n まだ 謎だ:
But I still don't know where in Astoltia the
Crushing Obsidian is...

274312.「そういうことでしたら こちらのケースに\n 保管された本も 調査に お役立てく:
In that case, the books stored in this case may be of use to you in your research. They are special for the purification of the
Fountain.

274313.「そこの キミ……。\n ちょっと いいかな？: You there... can I have a word with you?

274315.「ん……どうした？\n 何か言いたげな 顔をして……。\n<select_nc>:
Hm...what's up? You look like you're trying to
say something.
<select_nc>
Ashley...?
Ashley's...twin?
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

274317.「そうか！ 兄貴の知り合いか。\n アシュレイは 双子の兄でね……。:
Oh, yeah! You know my brother? Ashley is my
twin brother...

274318.「俺の名は レオーネ。\n 初代勇者の盟友だ。よろしくな。:
My name is Leone. I am the ally of the first
Hero. Nice to meet you.

274319.「キミのような反応は 久々だよ。\n 天使たちは 皆 事情を知ってるからさ。:
It's been a while since I've had a reaction
like yours. All the angels know what's going
on.

274320.「アシュレイの奴とは 別々に ここに来て\n 四天の星巡りでも あいつ 常に先行:
I came here separately from Ashley, and he was
always ahead of me on the Four Heavenly
Trials. We haven't met again yet.

274321.「フフ……でも 俺のことは\n しばらく 兄貴には内緒な。\n おどろかせてやろ:
Hehe...but don't tell my brother about me
for a while. I'm going to surprise him.

274322.「見たところ キミも英雄のようだけど……。: Looks like you're a hero, too, but...

274324.「四天の星巡りを始めたのは つい最近なのに\n ものすごい勢いで 追いあげる者が:
I've only recently started Four Heavenly
Trials, but I've heard that someone is
catching up fast... and it's you, isn't it?

274325.「会えて 光栄だ……っと しまった。\n 自分から聞いておいて 忘れてたよ。\n:
It's a pleasure to meet you... I'm sorry.
I asked and then forgot. Which one
is the Monastery?

274326.「助かる。あとで ゆっくり話そう。\n じゃあね <pc>。:
Thank you. We'll talk later. Bye
<pc>.

274328.「けど ここから 水源までは\n けっこうな距離が ある上に\n 道中には 魔物:
But it's a long way from here to the water
source, and there are even monsters along the
way.

274329.「勇者の本分は 人助け……か。\n ったく 言ってくれるな。時代が変わっても\n:
Hero's duty is to help people...? You're
right, you're right. There are some things
that don't change even if times change.

274330.「俺らも よく 言われたよ。\n 大魔王を倒すのです。なぜなら……:
We used to be told that too. We must defeat
the Great Demon King. Because...

274332.「レオ……レオーネなのか！\n ……昔のまんまじゃないか。:
Leo...you're Leone! ...You're just like you
used to be, aren't you?

274334.「夢みたいだよ お前も英雄として\n よみがえっていたなんて……。:
It's like a dream. I can't believe you're back
as a hero.

274335.「審判の天使たちが 何かにつけて\n 初代勇者のことを ほめそやすから\n こっ:
I knew you were here because the angels of
Judgement praised the first Hero at every
opportunity.

274336.「途中からは <pc>の名も\n よく 聞くようになったな。:
I've heard the name <pc> a lot along
the way.

274337.「えっ 何？ お前ら 知り合いなの？: Eh? What? You guys know each other?

274338.「水臭いな。レオは 俺の弟なんだぜ。\n 教えてくれても よかったろ？\n<se:
You're not being frank. Leo is my brother. You
could have told me, couldn't you?
<select_nc>
It was a secret
You didn't ask
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

274339.「内緒って なんだ そりゃ。: What kind of a secret is that?

274340.「お前の おどろく顔が 見たかったんだよ。\n それで 口止めしていたのさ。:
I wanted to see your surprised face. That's
why I kept quiet.

274341.「その返しは ないだろ……。\n お前 意外と さめた奴なんだな。:
That's not a very nice response... You're a
surprisingly calm guy, aren't you?

274342.「おかげで 兄貴の おどろく顔が見れた。\n ありがとな。:
Thanks to you, I was able to see my brother's
surprised face. Thanks.

274343.「試練だの なんだの……流されるように\n こなしてきたけど こんな うれしいこ:
I've been going through trials and all that,
but I never thought that something like this
would happen to me.

274344.「俺もだ……。また会えて うれしいよ。\n それと ふたりが神代の遺構に\n 入:
Me too... it's nice to see you again. And I'm
glad we met before you entered Ancient
Remains.

274345.「だいたいの事情は 天使長から聞いてる。\n 俺も 協力させてもらうよ。:
The Archangel has told me most of what's going
on. I'm willing to help.

274346.「でもよ……ここには 魔物が出るらしい。\n 神話時代の遺跡に 住みついているっ:
But you know... they say there are monsters
in here. They say they live in Mystical
Ruins...

274347.「どうせ ザコだろ？ 大魔王に比べりゃ\n どいつもこいつも 格下さ。死にはしな:
They're all just pawns, aren't they? Compared
to Great Demon King, they're all just low-
ranked. I won't let you die.

274348.「そんな顔 するなって。\n もう ヘマはしないから。:
Don't make that face. I won't screw up
anymore.

274349.「バカ ちがうって。また お前と\n 肩を並べて戦えるって 思うとな……。:
No, you idiot. The thought of fighting side by
side with you again...

274350.「じゃあ 行くとするか。目指すは 泉の水源だ。\n さくっと 浄化してこようぜ。:
Then let's go. Our goal is the source of the
fountain. Let's go purify it quickly.

274351.「こいつらが 汚染源か……。\n 見るからに 不潔そうだな。:
These guys are the source of the
pollution......they look filthy.

274352.「おい！ あれを壊されると\n マズイんじゃないのか？:
Hey! Wouldn't it be bad if you broke that
thing?

274353.「レオの 得意技だ。あれで 何度も助けられた。\n 大魔王ゴダと 戦ったときもな:
That was Leo's specialty. It saved my life
many times. Even when we fought Great Demon
King Goda...

274354.「よし！ 今のうちに 奴らを しとめよう。\n １匹は俺がやる。もう１匹は 頼ん:
All right! Let's take them down while we still
can, I'll take the first one. You take the
other one.

274356.「うっわ！ それ 持ってくんだ？\n お前の趣味が わからないよ……。:
Oh, my God! You're bringing that? I
don't know what your taste is...

274357.「さすがの 強さだね。\n まかせっきりにして すまない。:
You're very strong. I'm sorry for leaving
it to you.

274358.「何 言ってんの。お前のほうこそ\n 戦いたいのを ガマンして\n 守りを引き受:
What are you talking about? You're the one who
put up with the fight and took on the job of
defending us, aren't you?

274359.「まっ これから先 戦う機会は\n いくらでも あるか。んじゃ 戻ろうぜ。:
Well, there will be plenty of opportunities to
fight in the future. Let's go back.

274360.「おい 待て待て！\n 水源を 浄化しに来たんだよね？:
Hey, wait, wait! We're here to purify
the water supply, right?

274361.「いっけね 忘れてたわ！\n <cs_pchero> アレだよ アレ。\n アレ:
Oh my God, I forgot! <cs_pchero> That thing.
Use that thing.

274363.「まさか なくしたんじゃ ないよな？\n 早いとこ アレを使ってくれ！:
You didn't lose it, did you? Use that thing,
quick!

274365.<cs_pchero>は 清めの大玉を\n泉に 放り投げた。:
<cs_pchero> threw the Purifying Orb into the
fountain.

274367.「さっきまでの汚れが ウソみたいだね。\n こんなに キレイになるなんて\n 怖:
I can't believe how dirty it was just now.
It's scary how clean it's become...

274368.「上等じゃねえか。みそぎを するんだから\n キレイすぎるくらいで ちょうどいい:
It's fine. It's just right that it's too clean
because we're going to have a purification
ceremony.

274369.「そんじゃ 浄罪の泉に 行くとするか。\n たしか 聖天区画にあったよな。急ごう:
Well then, let's go to the Spring of Purity. I
think it's in the Holy Grounds. Let's hurry.

274370.「おお！ ようやく 戻られましたか！\n 見てください。この 透きとおった泉を！:
Oh! You're back at last! Look at this. Look at
this crystal clear fountain! Don't you think
it's even more beautiful than before?

274371.「あなたがたが やってくれたそうですね。\n さすがは アシュレイと レオーネ！:
I hear you guys did it. That's what I'm
talking about, Ashley and Leone!

274373.「みそぎは できるんだな？: You can do the purification, can't you?

274374.「もちろん！ ささっ 女神像の前に\n 立ってください。水がめの水を\n 全身で:
Of course! Just stand in front of the statue
of the goddess. All you have to do is to bathe
your whole body in the water.

274375.「たった それだけで いいのかい？: Is that all we need to do?

274376.「おっと 英雄レオーネには\n 説明が まだでしたな。:
Oops, I haven't explained to the heroic Leone
yet.

274377.「みそぎとは 前世で おかした罪や\n 背負った ケガレを払う 儀式なのです。:
Purification is a ritual to purge the sins
and wounds we have committed in our past
lives.

274378.「泉の水は ルティアナ様が流した 涙で\n できているという 言い伝えもありまし:
There is a legend that the water in the fountain is made up of the tears that Lady Lutiana shed. Hmmm. Seems like a good omen,
doesn't it?

274380.「それじゃ 女神ルティアナの\n ご利益に あやからせて もらうとするか。\n:
Well then, I'll take my blessing from the
Goddess Lutiana. I'll go first, right?

274382.「その態度 あまりに無礼であろう。\n 泉を預かる者として 恥ずかしくないのか。:
That attitude is so rude. As the custodian of
the fountain, have you no shame?

274383.「四天の星巡り 突破できましたね！ あなたなら\n やりとげると 信じてました。:
You made it through the Four Heavenly Trials!
I knew you would pull it off. I'll be
watching your big day here.

274384.「いいよなぁ。アイツには\n 親身になってくれる 天使がいて。\n 俺には そん:
It's nice, isn't it? They have an angel who
is kind to them. I don't have an angel. What
about you?

274386.「……なんとも 得体の知れないものですね。\n みそぎの さまたげになると いけ:
It's something very mysterious. I don't want
it to interfere with the purification
ceremony. I'll keep it with me.

274387.<pc>は 脈動する鉱石を\nユーライザに預けた。:
<pc> deposited the Pulsating Ore with
Yuliza.

274388.「うんうん。みそぎは すんだようだね。\n お前たちが 輝いて見えるよ。:
Mm-hm. Looks like the purification is done.
You all look radiant.

274389.「おっ <pc>じゃないか！\n くぅう～ 先を越されていたなんてよぉ。\n 次:
Oh, it's <pc>! I can't believe you
beat me to it. I'll definitely win next time!

274390.「バカ兄者！ 次なんて もうないだろ。\n 勝負は これっきりなんだよ。:
Stupid brother! There's no next time. This is
the last time we're going to play.

274391.「……兄ちゃん 姉ちゃん。\n そもそも 四天の星巡りは競争じゃないよ……。:
Brother, sister... To begin with, Four
Heavenly Trials is not a competition...

274392.「さあ お前たちも みそぎをすませな。\n でないと 話が始まらないよ。:
Now, you guys better finish your purification.
Otherwise, we won't be able to start the
conversation.

274393.「……偉大なるチカラのことだな？\n ならば さっさと すませるとしよう。:
You mean great power, right? Then let's get on
with it.

274394.「うむ。見違えたぞ 諸君。\n 生前の罪や ケガレは洗い流され\n 今 ここに:
Mm. You look different, everyone. The sins
and blemishes of your life have been washed
away, and now, here, your souls are cleansed.

274395.「一度は 人生を まっとうした諸君に\n かりそめの命を与え 度重なる試練を課し:
I've given a temporary life to a group of people who once lived a full life, and put them through a series of trials. I am sure you
must have felt that it was unreasonable.

274396.「だが すべては アストルティアのため……。\n 七柱の種族神は いずれも 肉体:
But for the sake of Astoltia, all seven
species' gods have either lost their bodies or
are in eternal slumber.

274397.「……実体なき 信仰の対象としてのみの 神は\n 現実の危機に際し 無力。真に求:
God as an object of faith without substance is powerless in times of real crisis. What is truly needed is a God who is the protector of
the world.

274398.「今 明かそう！ 諸君に与えられる\n 偉大なチカラとは……\n 神のチカラ そ:
I reveal it to you now! The greatest power
that can be given to you is the power of God
itself!

274399.「四天の星巡りとは 人の身である英雄を\n 神の高みに 昇らせることを目的とし\:
Four Heavenly Trials are designed to raise the
heroes to the height of godliness in the form
of human bodies and to make their souls stout.

274400.「いにしえより 我々 天使は 新たなる神の\n 候補たりうる者を求めて 様々な時:
Since time immemorial, we angels have gathered the souls of heroes from various eras in search of potential candidates for the new
Gods.

274401.「すべては 天星郷に伝わる 秘儀をもちいて\n 英雄を神化させるための 営みであ:
All of this was done in order to deify the
heroes using a secret ritual handed down in
Heaven.

274402.「近日 とりおこなわれる 神化の儀を経て\n 諸君は アストルティアを守る\n:
In a ceremony to be held soon, you will be
inducted into the ranks of the gods who
protect Astoltia.

274403.「新たなる神……うすうす そんなことだろうと\n 感じておりましたわ……。:
New God...I had a vague feeling that was what
you meant...

274404.「英雄といえど もとは ただの人。\n 神のチカラを 与えるなど……\n 許され:
Even heroes are just men. How can you give
them the power of God?

274405.「その資質を見極めるための 四天の星巡りだ。\n 諸君は 見事 突破してきた。\:
Four Heavenly Trials to see if you have what it takes. You've all passed with flying colors. I see all of you as divinely
qualified.

274406.「とてつもない チカラを得ても なお\n 私は 私でいられるのかな……ふふっ。\:
I wonder if I can still be me even after
gaining tremendous power.... It's getting
interesting, isn't it?

274407.「……それぞれ 思うところはあろう。\n ただ 強制だけはしないと 約束する。:
...I'm sure each of you has your own thoughts
on this. But I promise not to force you to do
anything.

274408.「諸君には 考える時間を与えよう。\n そして 神化の儀を受けるとの 同意を得た:
I will give you time to think. Then, after you have agreed to undergo the rite of apotheosis, we will light the last flame on the Soul
Candle of each of you.

274409.「特に <pc>……お前は\n 他の英雄とちがい 生きながらにして\n フォーリ:
Especially <pc>...you, unlike other
heroes, were invited to Fourion in life.

274410.「神化とは すなわち 人間をやめること。\n その決断は 重かろう。受けるか 否:
Deification means ceasing to be human. Your decision must be a heavy one. Whether you accept or reject it...I respect your free
will.

274411.「儀式の準備が ととのいしだい 連絡する。\n それまで 神都の回生堂で 疲れを:
I will contact you as soon as ceremony is ready. Until then, you are to stay in the rest spot in the capital city to recover from your
exhaustion and make up your mind.

274414.「いったい ここで何が……？: What the hell is going on here?

274415.「そんな……これと 似たものが\n 確かに アルビデの手に ついていたのに……。:
Oh, no... something similar to this was indeed
on Albide's hand...

274416.「でも この赤いアザ……\n まるで キズあとのよう……。: But this red bruise... it looks like a scar...

274417.「こんな植物……見たことがない。\n それに この感触……まるで 石のよう。:
I have never seen a plant like this. And this
texture...it's like a stone.

274418.「あなたから 預かっている\n これと似ていると 思いませんか？<yesno><:
Does this look anything like the one I'm
holding in front of you?<yesno><close>

274419.「やはり あなたも そう思いますか……。: I'm sure you think so, too...

274420.「そうでしょうか……\n 私は 似ていると思うのですが……。:
I don't know...I think they are
similar...but...

274421.「どちらにせよ アルビデが\n 偶然 ここに来て 死んだとは思えない。:
Either way, I don't believe Albide came here
by accident and died.

274422.「水源に現れた魔物が 落としたものと\n アルビデの左手に 付着していたものが\:
If what was dropped by the monster that
appeared at the water source is the same as
what was attached to Albide's left hand...

274423.「みそぎもジャマされたし 深翠の試練では\n 予期せぬ 事故があったとも\n フ:
Fedira told me that the purification was
interrupted and that there was an unexpected
accident during the Deep Green Trials.

274424.「気味が悪い……。まるで 神化の儀を\n さまたげようとする 意思が働いてるかの:
It's creepy... as if there's a will at work to
thwart the ritual of deification.

274425.「これは……私の手には 負えない。\n 死者が出てる以上 天使長の判断を\n あ:
This is... out of my hands. With all the
deaths, I must defer to the Archangel's
judgment.

274426.「私は 聖天舎に戻り\n この件を 天使長に報告します。:
I will return to the monastery and report this
matter to the Archangel.

274427.「アルビデを このままにしておくのは\n 心苦しいですが いったん ここを出まし:
It pains me to leave Albide like this, but
let's get out of here for now.

274428.「なにやら 天使と一緒になって\n 調べ物をしていた そうじゃないか。:
I heard that you and the angel were doing
research together.

274429.「誰かのために あくせく\n 走り回るところが いかにも 盟友らしい。:
Running around for someone's sake
really seems like an ally.

274430.「皮肉で 言ってるんじゃないよ。\n 俺だって 勇者の盟友と\n 呼ばれていたか:
I'm not being sarcastic. I've been called an
ally of Hero, too.

274431.「だからなのかな……。\n キミには 近しいものを感じるんだ。:
Maybe that's why... I feel something close to
you.

274432.「俺が生きていたのは 太古の昔……\n 始まりの大魔王ゴダの 侵攻があった時代だ:
I lived in the time of the Ancient of Days... the time of the invasion of Goda, the Great Demon King of the Beginning. Most of my life
was spent fighting.

274433.「家を焼かれ 死体の山が築かれ……\n 人類の領土が 徐々に 削られていく。\n:
Homes were burned, bodies piled up, and the
territory of the human race was gradually
whittled away. It was a living hell.

274434.「それに比べて 今はどうだ？\n 聞けば 大魔王の侵略を 最小限の被害で\n お:
How about now, by comparison? I hear that you
were able to hold off the Great Demon King's
invasion with minimal damage.

274435.「当代の 勇者と盟友は すごいよ。\n 俺たちには できなかった芸当だ……。:
The current hero and ally are amazing.
This is a feat that we couldn't do...

274436.「……なあ キミは この時代に\n 盟友として生を受け しあわせだったかい？<y:
...Hey, were you happy to be born ally in this
time?<yesno><close>

274437.「そうか……キミにも それなりの苦労が\n あったんだろうに……。\n 素直に:
Well... you must have had your share of
hardships, and it's a virtue to be able to
answer honestly like that.

274438.「しあわせと 言いきれないか……。\n まあ……盟友の 宿命かもしれないね。:
I can't say I'm happy, or maybe that's just
the fate of our allies.

274439.「おっ！ ふたりとも\n こんなところに いたのか。: Whoa! Both of you were in a place like this?

274440.「さっき 使いの天使が やってきてな\n 明日 神化の儀をやるってさ。:
A messenger angel came to me just now and told
me that tomorrow we'll hold the Divination
Ceremony.

274441.「まいっちゃうよな。英雄なんて ご大層な\n 肩書きで 復活させられたってだけで:
It's just too much, isn't it? It's like, "Why
did they resurrect him with such a big title
as a hero?"

274442.「なのに 今度は 神さまだぜ！ 神さま！\n あのグランゼニス神と 対等になるの:
And now it's God! God! I can't believe we're
on equal footing with that Gran Zenith god...

274443.「よおよお グランゼニスぅ。\n お前は 相変わらず 寝坊助だなぁ！\n 最近:
Hey, hey, Gran Zenith. You're still the same
old sleepyhead! You've been slacking lately,
haven't you?

274444.「新米の神と 種族神じゃ 格がちがうだろ。\n なめたクチをきくと 痛い目 見る:
There is a difference between a new god and a
species god. Don't be a fool, or you'll be in
for a world of pain.

274445.「とはいえ グランゼニス神は 俺らの時代でも\n お姿を 見せなくなっていたか…:
But then again, the God of Gran Zenith was no
longer visible even in our time...

274446.「……天使長の話からすると グランゼニス神は\n いまだ 眠ったままのようだね。:
From what the Archangel said, it seems that the god Gran Zenith is still asleep. Then I guess I don't have to worry about being
vindicated.

274447.「にしても 神さまかぁ……\n アシュレイ神……悪くない ひびきだ！:
But still...God...God Ashley...not bad...not
bad at all!

274448.「でも 他のみんなは 神になることに\n いろいろと 思うところが あるみたいだ:
But everyone else seems to have their own
thoughts on the whole god thing.

274449.「そうかぁ？ どいつも こいつも\n 前夜祭だとか言って 大さわぎしてるぜ。\n:
Is that so? They're all talking about the eve
of the ceremony and making a big deal out
of it. You didn't seem bothered.

274450.「まあ そんなワケだからさ お前らも\n しんみりしてないで 下に来いよ。\n:
Well, that's why you guys shouldn't be so
gloomy, come on downstairs. Let's spend the
whole night together!

274451.<pc>と レオーネは\nアシュレイに連れられて １階に下りた。:
<pc> and Leone were taken downstairs
by Ashley.

274452.英雄たちの宴は 大いに盛りあがった。\nある者は歌い ある者は踊り\nそれぞれに:
The feast of the heroes was a great success.
Some sang, some danced, and each spent a
joyous evening...

274454.「昨日は 調査に つきあっていただき\n ありがとうございました。: Thank you very much for your time yesterday.

274455.「こんなときですが……手伝ってもらった\n あなたには 聞いてもらいたいのです。:
At a time like this... you helped me.
I want you to listen.

274456.「あのあと アルビデの死を 天使長に報告し\n 奇妙な石も 証拠として 提出しま:
Afterwards, I reported Albide's death to the
Archangel and submitted the strange stone as
evidence.

274457.「でも……立ち入り禁止の危険地帯で\n 起こったことだけに ただの事故死として\:
But... since it happened in a dangerous area
that was off-limits, it was treated as just an
accidental death.

274458.「神化の儀が 目前に迫ってるので\n おおごとには したくないのでしょうね……。:
I guess they don't want to make a big deal out
of it, with the apotheosis ceremony right
around the corner...

274459.「ならばこそ なおのこと 原因を究明しなければ\n ならないはず！ この件を う:
If this is the case, then we must investigate the cause even more! I am not willing to perform the deification ceremony with this
matter left unresolved.

274460.「あっ いえ……今のは聞かなかったことに……。\n 聖天舎の一員として あるまじ:
Oh, no...you didn't hear that...that was an
unbecoming comment from a member of Monastery.

274461.「さあ あなたを追い返した 無礼者に\n ぎゃふんと 言わせてやりましょう！:
Now let's give the rude man who turned you
away a good scolding!

274462.「おや ヘルヴェル様。いかがされましたか？: Oh, Miss Helvel. How are you?

274463.「刻限を過ぎても 英雄が そろわなくてな。\n 残り ２名なんだが 見ていないか:
The clock is ticking and the heroes aren't
gathered. I've got two left. Have you seen
them?

274464.「いやぁ どうでしたかねぇ？\n あなた方と ちがって ひとりひとり\n 英雄を:
Well, how did it go? Unlike you, I don't know
each and every one of these heroes...

274465.「ん……そうか。\n では うしろを向いてみろ。: Hmm...I see. Then look behind you.

274467.「なぜ <pc>を 追い返したのです？\n どういうことか 説明しなさい！:
Why did you turn <pc> away? Explain
yourself!

274468.「い 言いがかりは よしてくれ。\n まさか その 平凡を絵に描いたような奴が\:
Don't make false accusations. No one would
think that a person who is the picture
of mediocrity is a hero.

274469.「しらじらしいッ！ わかっていて\n のけ者にしたのでしょう！:
How shameless! You knew what you were doing
and you left them out of it!

274470.「弁解の余地も ないようだな。\n ならば 謝罪し 非礼を詫びよ。:
It seems you have no excuse. Then apologize,
and apologize for your impoliteness.

274472.「ひとつ 許してやってくれ。\n この件は 解決ということで よいな？:
Let's forgive him for one thing. Let's call
this matter settled, shall we?

274474.「我らの祖先は ルティアナ様が\n このアストルティアを\n お創りになるのを:
Our ancestors witnessed the creation of this
Astoltia by Lutiana.

274475.「女神は 我らを導く光であったお方。\n その 尊き光が この者の過失によって\:
The Goddess was the light that guided us. That
precious light has been lost through the
negligence of this one!

274476.「このような 大逆の徒に\n 神化の儀を受けさせるなど 言語道断！:
To allow such a high treasonous person to
undergo a divination ceremony is outrageous!

274477.「……女神を思う気持ちは よくわかった。\n そなたと 同じ思いを抱える同胞が\:
I understand how you feel about the Goddess. I
am also aware that there are many of my people
who feel the same way as you do.

274478.「こここ…こいつがッ！\n こいつのせいで ルティアナ様が！！:
It's them! It's their fault that Master
Lutiana is gone!!

274479.「黙れ！ 女神が お創りになった 世界を守る。\n すべてにおいて優先される 我:
Shut up! We protect the world that the Goddess
created. It is our duty to protect it above
all else.

274480.「貴様も天使なら こころざしの高さで\n 私情を 乗り越えてみせよ！:
If you too are an angel, you shall overcome
your personal feelings with the height of your
heart!

274481.「ユーライザ その者をともない\n 天の聖壇へ お行きなさい。\n お前も 神化:
Yuliza, go with them to the Heavenly Altar.
You, too, may witness the ritual of the
apotheosis.

274482.「私は 英雄フォステイルを 探しにいく。: I go in search of the hero, Fostail.

274484.「……すでに 始まっているようですね。\n 彼らの儀式が 終わるのを待ちましょう:
...it seems to have already begun. Let's wait
for them to finish their ritual.

274485.「……四天の星巡りによって みがかれ\n そして みそぎによって 清められた\n:
...Having been purified by the Four Heavenly Trials and undergone purification, your souls are now qualified to ascend
the ladder to God.

274486.「かりそめの 血肉を捨て\n 女神が創りたもうた この世界を支える\n あらたな:
Do you swear to cast aside your meager flesh
and blood and become a new pillar to sustain
this world that the Goddess has created?

274487.「よろしい。魂の燭台に 最後の炎を！: Very well. Soul Candle, last flame!

274488.「続いて 誓いの証として\n 魂の燭台を 神化の光炉に投げ入れよ。:
Then, as a token of your oath, cast the Soul
Candle into the Divine Furnace.

274490.「フォステイルは まだ 来ませんね。\n 何か あったのでしょうか……。:
Fostail hasn't come in yet. I wonder if
something happened...

274491.「その神化の炎は 霊的には 諸君の分身であり\n かつ 神化を促す 触媒でもある:
The Divine Flame is your spiritual alter ego
and the catalyst for your divinization. Take
the Divine Flame into yourselves.

274492.「今 ここに アストルティアを守護する\n 八柱の神々が 顕現した！:
Here now are the eight gods that guard
Astoltia!

274493.「これが 神のチカラ……。\n オレたちの願いを かなえるチカラか。\n 身の内:
This is the power of God... to grant our
wishes. This omnipotence that comes from
within...

274494.「オレは このチカラで……\n みずからの過ちを 正してみせよう。\n ドワチャ:
I will use my power to right my own wrongs. I
will restore Dwachakka Continent to its
rightful place.

274495.「アタシたちは ドワチャッカの神となる。 \n フフッ……愚かなる歴史に 終止符:
We will be the gods of Dwachakka. We will put
an end to this foolish history! We will crush
everything in our path!

274496.「ドワチャッカ大陸を あるべき姿にィ！\n ボク……ワクワクしてきたよぉおおおッ:
Dwachakka Continent as it should be! I'm so
excited!

274497.「大切なものを ただ 守りたかった……。 \n だからこそ 己のすべてを かけて:
I only wanted to protect what was important to me... which is why I risked everything to challenge the King of Calamity single-
handedly. ...

274498.「だが どうだ？ 友は死に 国は滅びた！\n 抗うことが 苦痛を長引かせるだけな:
But what do you think? My friends are dead, my country is ruined! If resisting only prolongs the pain, why don't I just end it myself from
the start?

274499.「ああ……我が身を満たす 甘美なるチカラ。\n なんと すばらしい！:
Ah...the sweet power that fills me. How
wonderful!

274500.「このチカラで わたくしは\n なにより愛した かの国を……\n 滅ぼすことと:
With this power, I will use it to destroy the
country I love more than anything else <heart>.

274501.「人類なぞ 大魔王に 滅ぼされるべきだった。\n あの戦いを生き抜いた 兄貴なら:
Humanity should have been destroyed by the
Great Demon King. If you're my brother who
survived that battle, wouldn't you know that?

274502.「ああ……イヤというほど 思い知った。\n ひとりひとりは 善でも 群れると悪に:
Ah... I've come to learn that all too well. Each one of us may be good, but when we flock together, we become evil. And when there is
peace, people fight among themselves.

274503.「共通の敵がいるうちは 結束してたのに……。:
We were united as long as we had a common
enemy...

274504.「人間ってのは つくづく 度しがたいね。\n このチカラで 世界を一変させよう。:
Humans are so unbelievable. Let's use this
power to change the world.

274505.「お前らッ！！ 偉大なるチカラで\n 世界を作り変えようぜ！:
You guys! Let's remake the world with our
great power!

274507.「……ラダ・ガートよ。\n おぬしは 正気なのだな？: Lada Gart. Are you in your right mind?

274508.「ああ 正気だとも……\n だからこそ 俺は待っている。\n <cs_pcher:
Yeah, I'm sane... which is why I'm waiting.
I'm waiting for <cs_pchero> to become a god!

274509.「さあ お前も神になれ。\n 俺とお前で 天星郷を滅ぼそう。:
Come on, you too, become a god. Let's destroy
Heaven together.

274510.「俺なんかを 英雄に選んだ挙句\n 絶大なるチカラを 授けてしまう……\n 愚か:
Let's bring down the hammer on those foolish
angels who chose me as their hero, and then
bestowed upon me their immense power.

274511.「どうした 怖れているのか？\n この神秘を体験すれば 世界が 一変するぞ。\n:
What's the matter? Are you afraid? This mystery will change your world. There is no need for hesitation. You will know it when you
see it.

274512.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を\n 見せてやる。その身で味わえば\n お前も:
Well... I'll show you a glimpse of God's
power. If you taste it for yourself, you too
will want this power.

274514.「こんな俺に 過ぎたチカラを与え\n 見せかけの希望を 与えようとする\n 天使:
I am disgusted at the angels who try to give
me such power and pretended hope.

274515.「手に入れたチカラで 愚かなる天使どもに\n 鉄槌を下す！ お前も 手を貸してく:
With the power I've received, I will strike
down these foolish angels! And I need your
help!

274516.「どうした 怖れているのか？\n この神秘を体験すれば 世界が 一変するぞ。\n:
What's the matter? Are you afraid? This mystery will change your world. There is no need for hesitation. You will know it when you
see it.

274517.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を\n 見せてやる。その身で味わえば\n お前も:
Well... I'll show you a glimpse of God's
power. If you taste it for yourself, you too
will want this power.

274518.「神のチカラを見せると 言いながら\n このざまでは 立つ瀬がないな。:
While saying that I'll show you the
power of God, there's no turning back
at this point.

274519.「お前ほどの剛の者に 神のチカラを\n 欲する気持ちを 抱かせるには\n もっと:
I guess I'll have to be more serious to make a
person as hardy as you feel the desire for
God's power.

274520.「見るがいい！ <cs_pchero>！\n これが 神のチカラだ！！:
You'll see! <cs_pchero>! This is the power
of God!

274521.「な……なんという 禍々しさだ。\n あんなものが まともな神であろうはずがない:
How ominous! How could such a thing be a
proper god?

274522.「あれは 悪しき神……悪神だ！！: That is an evil god... a fiend!

274523.「どうだ？ ほしくなってきたろう。\n この すばらしき 神のチカラぁあああ！！:
What do you think? You're going to want it,
aren't you? This wonderful power of God!

274525.「その身に刻まねば わからぬか。\n 神のチカラ とくと 味わうがいい！\n 必:
You must feel it in your body to understand
it. Taste only the power of God! You'll be
mesmerized!

274526.「神化の儀は 失敗だったのでしょうか。\n 手順にのっとって おこなったのに……:
Was the deification ceremony a failure? I did
it according to procedure.

274527.「古文書に 誤りがあったとかぁ？: Is there an error in the ancient document?

274528.「確かなのは 英雄たちが 邪悪な何かに\n 変質してしまった ことだけだ。:
All we know for sure is that our heroes have
turned into something evil.

274529.「倒れても なお 邪悪な気を放つか……。\n これ以上 暴れられては シャレにな:
Even if he falls down, he still releases his evil chi... It would be a shame if he gets out of control any more. If we're going to
contain him, it's now or never, when he's weak.

274530.「そんな！ 復活させるのに\n あれだけ 苦労したんですよ！: Oh no! We worked so hard to revive him!

274531.「やむをえまい……ラダ・ガートを 魂に戻す。: It's unavoidable...Lada Gart back to the soul.

274532.「以前は こんな色ではなかった……。\n この にごりを 除去しないかぎり\n:
It didn't used to be this color... We can't
bring it back unless we remove this stain.

274533.「我々は とんでもないものを\n 世に 解き放ってしまいました。\n 悪神を野放:
We have unleashed something terrible upon the
world. We can't let the fiends run wild.

274534.「……何が 言いたい？: What do you want to say?

274535.「ただちに <cs_pchero>に\n 神化の儀をおこない 神となさしめましょ:
Let <cs_pchero> be deified and made a god
immediately. Then let them go forth to defeat
the fiends.

274536.「バカを言え！ 悪神を 増やすだけだ。\n 失敗の原因だって わかってないんだぞ:
Speak nonsense! You'll only create more
fiends. You don't even know why it failed.

274537.「この者と 他の英雄には ひとつ大きな\n ちがいがあります。それは 生者である:
There is one big difference between this one
and other heroes. They are a living person.

274538.「生者の魂なら 神化の儀に\n 成功するのでは ないでしょうか。:
If it's a living soul, wouldn't it succeed
in the apotheosis ceremony?

274539.「手を こまねいていても\n 状況は悪くなる 一方です 天使長！:
Even if we do nothing, the situation
will only get worse, Archangel!

274540.「……ダメだ。許可できない。\n まずは ラダ・ガートの魂を調べ\n にごりの原:
...No. I can't allow it. First, we must
examine Lada Gart's soul to determine the
cause of the stain.

274541.「その過程で なぜ 神化の儀が\n 失敗に終わったのかが 見えてくるかもしれん。:
In the process, we may begin to see why the
deification ritual failed.

274542.「何ひとつ わからぬまま 儀式を強行しても\n いたずらに 傷口を 広げるだけだ:
Forcing them to go through with the ritual
without knowing what they're doing is just
going to open up more wounds.

274543.「神化の儀は ひとまず 中断とする。\n 皆 それぞれの 持ち場に戻るように。\:
The apotheosis ceremony will be suspended for
the time being. Everyone should return to
their posts. Stand by for another order.

274544.「聞いてのとおり 神化の儀は ひとまず中断だ。:
As you can hear, the Divination Ceremony has
been suspended for now.

274545.「最悪な状況の中で よく ラダ・ガートを\n 無力化してくれた。私から 礼をさせ:
You did well to neutralize Lada Gart under the
worst possible circumstances. Allow me to
thank you.

274546.「……フォステイルが ついに\n 姿を現さなかったのも 気になるな。\n こちら:
I'm also concerned that Fostail didn't show up
at last. We'll have to deal with that later.

274547.「ゆくえをくらませた 悪神どもが\n おとなしく しているはずがない。\n 遠か:
The fiends that have gone astray will not stay
quiet. They will bring misfortune to the world
in the not-too-distant future.

274548.「我々も 悪神のゆくえを 全力で追う。\n 彼らのゆくえが つかめたときは お前:
We will do our best to track down the fiends.
When we find out what they are up to, you, as
one of our heroes, will lend a hand.

274685.「あなたは 回生堂に戻ってください。\n 神化の儀を おこなうとの連絡が\n そ:
You should return to the rest spot. You may
receive a call soon that you are to perform
the Divination Ceremony.

274686.いよいよ 神化の儀の当日だ。\n聖天区画の北側にある 天の聖壇への昇降機で\n天:
The day of the Divination Ceremony had arrived. Take the elevator to the Heavenly Altar located at the north of the Holy Grounds
and go to the ceremony.

276977.「そして ルティアナ様までが 世を去られた。\n ここに至り 我らは 四天の星巡:
And even Lutiana has left the world. We are now obliged to carry out the Four Heavenly Trials and the Deification Ceremony ahead of
schedule.

287658.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが\n そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。\n:
It was a mistake to be lured to Heaven by an
angel in the first place. Because...I am not a
hero.

287659.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果\n 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと\n:
I chased after my dreams, and as a result, my daughter and companions were sacrificed, and I was the only one who
survived.

287660.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……\n 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚:
What kind of a king is this fool who has made his mark on history, but rests on his laurels at the expense of others! What is the heroic
Lada Gart!

287661.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう\n やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるな:
But you may take a life by mistake. If that
happens, don't hate me!

287662.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが\n そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。\n:
It was a mistake to be lured to Heaven by an
angel in the first place. Because...I am not a
hero.

287663.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果\n 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと\n:
I chased after my dreams, and as a result, my daughter and companions were sacrificed, and I was the only one who
survived.

287664.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……\n 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚:
What kind of a king is this fool who has made his mark on history, but rests on his laurels at the expense of others! What is the heroic
Lada Gart!

287665.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう\n やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるな:
But you may take a life by mistake. If that
happens, don't hate me!
